trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Varnyr has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put Varnyr to sleep.

action.name: Cane
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Varnyr adds 2 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Varnyr must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
